description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), Conservation and Protection (C&P) program, has an operational requirement to secure the contract for a contractor to provide 'base hail management information receival services.'We require a contractor to provide 24/7 call center services for receiving hail calls and forwarding associated data to DFO
